languages.text: "Если позволите, я поясню. По неписанному правилу каждый Вольный Торговец, высадившийся на станции, имеет право отменить любое решение Наместника. Но есть тонкость — в Просторе Коронус несколько влиятельных династий Вольных Торговцев, и Футфол лежит на пересечении их интересов".

traits.locale_text: "Если позволите, я поясню. По неписанному правилу каждый Вольный Торговец, высадившийся на станции, имеет право отменить любое решение наместника. Но есть тонкость — в Просторе Коронус несколько влиятельных династий Вольных Торговцев, и Футфол лежит на пересечении их интересов".

languages.text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."
languages.original_text: "Если позволите, я поясню. По неписанному правилу каждый Вольный Торговец, высадившийся на станции, имеет право отменить любое решение Наместника. Но есть тонкость — в Просторе Коронус несколько влиятельных династий Вольных Торговцев, и Футфол лежит на пересечении их интересов".

traits.locale_text: "I will explain, if you do not mind. According to the unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Governor's decisions. But there is a catch — Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests cross."

But there is a catch — Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests cross."

But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

"I shall explain, if you do not mind. According to the unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

"I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

languages.text: «Si me lo permite, se lo explicaré. Según una regla no escrita, todo Comerciante Independiente que llegue a la estación puede vetar cualquiera de las decisiones del Señor. Sin embargo, hay un problema: la Extensión de Koronus sirve de base a varias dinastías de Comerciantes Independientes muy influyentes y Paso está situada en la encrucijada».
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: «Si me lo permite, se lo explicaré. Según una regla no escrita, todo Comerciante Independiente que llegue a la estación puede vetar cualquiera de las decisiones del Señor. Sin embargo, hay un problema: la Extensión de Koronus sirve de base a varias dinastías de Comerciantes Independientes muy influyentes y Paso está situada en la encrucijada».

languages.text: “如果您不介意的话，请允许我解释一下。根据这里不成文的规定，每位来到落脚港的行商浪人都有权否决当地总督的任何决定，但这就是问题所在：科罗努斯扩区有好几个很有影响力的行商浪人王朝，而他们的利益会在落脚港发生纠葛。”
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: “如果您不介意的话，请允许我解释一下。根据这里不成文的规定，每位来到落脚港的行商浪人都有权否决当地总督的任何决定，但这就是问题所在：科罗努斯星域有好几个很有影响力的行商浪人王朝，而他们的利益会在落脚港发生纠葛。”

languages.text: 「お差し支えなければ説明させていただきます。暗黙のルールで、ステーションに到着するすべての自由開拓者が領主の決定に拒否権を発動する権利を持っています。しかし、そこには落とし穴が…コロヌス・エクスパンスには影響力のある自由開拓者の王朝が複数あり、フットフォールはその利害が交差する場所なのです」
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: 「お差し支えなければ説明させていただきます。暗黙のルールで、ステーションに到着するすべての自由開拓者が領主の決定に拒否権を発動する権利を持っています。しかし、そこには落とし穴が…コロヌス・エクスパンスには影響力のある自由開拓者の王朝が複数あり、フットフォールはその利害が交差する場所なのです」

languages.text: "Ich erkläre es kurz, wenn ich darf. Einem ungeschriebenen Gesetz zufolge haben alle Freihändler auf der Station das Recht, gegen jede Entscheidung des Lehnsherren ein Veto einzulegen. Allerdings gibt es dabei einen Haken – in der Koronus-Ausdehnung sind mehrere einflussreiche Freihändler-Dynastien aktiv, und auf Footfall überschneiden sich ihre Interessen."
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erkläre es kurz, wenn ich darf. Einem ungeschriebenen Gesetz zufolge haben alle Freihändler auf der Station das Recht, gegen jede Entscheidung des Lehnsherren ein Veto einzulegen. Allerdings gibt es dabei einen Haken – in der Koronus-Ausdehnung sind mehrere einflussreiche Freihändler-Dynastien aktiv, und auf Footfall überschneiden sich ihre Interessen."

languages.text: « Permettez-moi quelques éclaircissements. D'après cette règle tacite, tout libre-marchand arrivant à la station a un droit de veto sur les décisions du suzerain. Mais ce n'est pas si simple : plusieurs dynasties influentes de libres-marchands évoluent dans les Étendues de Koronus, et c'est à Castel que leurs intérêts se croisent. »
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi quelques éclaircissements. D'après la règle tacite, tout libre-marchand arrivant à la station a un droit de veto sur les décisions du suzerain. Mais ce n'est pas si simple : plusieurs dynasties influentes de libres-marchands évoluent dans les Étendues de Koronus, et c'est à Castel que leurs intérêts se croisent. »

languages.text: "Müsaadenizle ben açıklayayım. Bu yazılı olmayan kurala göre istasyona gelen her Hür Tacir, Emîr'in kararlarından hangisini isterse veto etme hakkına sahiptir lakin bunun bazı sonuçları olur: Koronus Enginliği birkaç nüfuzlu Hür Tacir hanedanlığına ev sahipliği yapar ve Binliman da onların çıkarlarının çatıştığı yerdir."
languages.original_text: "I shall explain, if you do not mind. As per this unwritten rule, every Rogue Trader arriving at the station has the right to veto any of the Liege's decisions. But there is a catch — the Koronus Expanse is home to several influential Rogue Trader dynasties, and Footfall is where their interests intersect."

traits.locale_text: "Müsaadenizle ben açıklayayım. Bu yazılı olmayan kurala göre istasyona her gelen Hür Tacir, Emîr'in kararlarından hangisini isterse veto etme hakkına sahiptir ama bunun bazı sonuçları olur: Koronus Enginliği birkaç güçlü Hür Tacir hanedanlığına ev sahipliği yapar ve Binliman onların çıkarlarının çatıştığı yerdir."
